video.title: Johnny Test
video.synopsis: Crafty 11-year-old Johnny Test and his genetically modified talking dog go on high-octane adventures to save his family (and the world) from disaster.

episodes.synopsis: Johnny & Dukey think they're dealing with mole people. / Susan & Mary give Gil special bubble love gum that turns him into a rampaging monkey boy.
episodes.title: Johnny to the Center of the Earth / Johnny X

episodes.synopsis: Susan & Mary create the Alchemy 5000, a device that turns objects to gold. / Johnny seeks baseball help from his sisters.
episodes.title: Johnny vs. Bling Bling Boy / Johnny Impossible

episodes.synopsis: The girls test a device on Johnny that will make him look good at their party, but he turns into a monster. / Johnny tries to foil some extreme teens.
episodes.title: Johnny Test: Party Monster / Johnny Test: Extreme Crime Stopper

episodes.synopsis: Johnny and Dukey bribe the girls to give them gills so they can breath underwater; Johnny finds that school popularity is based on backpack choice.
episodes.title: Aqua Johnny / Johnny & the Amazing Turbo Action Backpack

episodes.synopsis: The Ice Pigs hockey team are big losers, so Johnny asks his sisters for help. / Mom has a big client coming over for dinner.
episodes.title: Johnny & the Ice Pigs / Johnny's House of Horrors

episodes.synopsis: When Johnny asks his sisters to improve his intellect, they invent smarty pants. / Johnny sneaks into Mom's lab and inadvertently releases a missile.
episodes.title: Johnny's Super Smarty Pants / Take Your Johnny to Work Day

episodes.synopsis: Susan and Mary use their Static Animator to bring Johnny's Mega Roboticle toy to life. / Johnny steals a rocket his sisters made to go to the moon.
episodes.title: Johnny & the Mega Robotics / Johnny Gets Mooned

episodes.synopsis: Johnny and Dukey use a gadget to travel into the latest Speed McCool movie. / The girls use their turbo time rewinder to get Johnny in trouble.
episodes.title: Johnny Hollywood / Johnny's Turbo Time Rewinder

episodes.synopsis: At the science expo, Bling-Bling shows up with his newest evil invention, the Repto-Slicer. / The girls make a blazing-fast scooter for Johnny.
episodes.title: The Return of Johnny X / Sonic Johnny

episodes.synopsis: Susan and Mary invent a neural obedience collar to control Dukey's every move. / Chaos results when the girls concoct a pimple cream.
episodes.title: The Dog Days of Johnny / Johnny's Pink Plague

episodes.synopsis: Johnny can shred skateboarding video games but has trouble doing the real thing on a half-pipe. / Johnny shrinks his toys to make his room look clean.
episodes.title: Johnny's Extreme Game Controller / Li'l Johnny

episodes.synopsis: A coffee-cart worker at Mega-Institute concocts a beverage that freezes the students' brains! / Johnny uses a gizmo in the girls' lab to make it snow.
episodes.title: Johnny vs. Brain Freezer / Johnny's Big Snow Job

episodes.synopsis: After Johnny gets whipped in dodgeball, the girls make a bionic arm for him. / Bling-Bling creates a living, breathing monster truck to impress Susan.
episodes.title: Johnny Dodgeball / Johnny & the Attack of the Monster Truck

episodes.synopsis: Johnny borrows a Time Machine to get pirate training from Blackbeard. / Mr. Whack-O sends Robo-Pals to all of the children of Porkbelly.
episodes.title: Hoist the Johnny Roger / Johnny's Turbo Toy Force

episodes.synopsis: Johnny, Dukey, Susan & Mary are bored and decide to start their own TV channel. / Sissy challenges Johnny to a video game showdown.
episodes.title: JTV / Johnny vs. Bling Bling 2

episodes.synopsis: Johnny and Dukey decide to build their own amusement park right at home. / Johnny convinces the girls to make a perfect paternal copycat.
episodes.title: Johnnyland / Johnny's Got a Brand New Dad

episodes.synopsis: Johnny borrows Susan & Mary's Saturday Repeater Machine. / Johnny & Dukey enlist Susan and Mary to help them make their own ice cream.
episodes.title: Saturday Night's Alright for Johnny / Johnny Mint Chip

episodes.synopsis: Johnny takes Reptoslicer to Pet Day instead of Dukey. / Johnny learns karma might just be a real thing after his rudeness catches up to him.
episodes.title: Johnny's Pet Day / Phat Johnny

episodes.synopsis: An alien pod kidnaps Susan, so Mary gives Johnny & Dukey super powers. / Johnny & Dukey sneak into a cross dimensional travel chamber.
episodes.title: The Revenge of Johnny X / The Enchanted Land of Johnnia

episodes.synopsis: Johnny insists the girls make a Johnny Robot to help out with chores. / Johnny has to write a 500 word report on the Founding fathers of Porkbelly.
episodes.title: 101 Johnnies / Johnny Zombie Tea Party

episodes.synopsis: The General orders Mr. Black & Mr. White to spy on the kids. / It's time for the annual Test family vacation!
episodes.title: Johnny Test in Black & White / Johnny the Kid

episodes.synopsis: Johnny and Dukey want to win a radio station prize, - a trip to Mt. Porkbelly to ski the "Behemoth". / The kids find a monster in Lake Porkbelly.
episodes.title: Downhill Johnny / Johnny Meets the Pork-Ness Monster

episodes.synopsis: Johnny's report card says that he needs to become more helpful to others. / Susan & Mary invent attractive boyborgs to make Gil jealous.
episodes.title: Johnny X Strikes Back / Johnny vs. Super Soaking Cyborgs

episodes.synopsis: Mr. Mittens is terrorizing the animals of Porkbelly by turning them all into cats. / Dukey pretends to be Johnny's Dad for a field trip.
episodes.title: 00-Johnny / Johnny of the Jungle

episodes.synopsis: Johnny accidentally brings Smash Badger to life. / A swarm of bees is scooping up all the candy, pies, cakes in Porkbelly.
episodes.title: Johnny vs. Smash Badger 3 / Johnny Bee Good

episodes.synopsis: As compensation for damage to their lab, the girls make Johnny a guinea pig for an experiment. / Johnny asks his sisters to build him a sleep ray.
episodes.title: The Good, the Bad & the Johnny / Rock-a-bye Johnny

episodes.synopsis: The girls create a lozenge to make Bling-Bling hate Susan. / Johnny decides to enter a wrestling contest to win a $10,000 prize.
episodes.title: Johnny vs. Bling-Bling 3 / Stinkin' Johnny

episodes.synopsis: A freak summer snowstorm creates an army of evil snowmen. / Susan and Dukey take on Johnny and Mary in an all out blitz for household supremacy.
episodes.title: Johnny X & the Attack of the Snowmen / Johnny vs. Dukey

episodes.synopsis: Johnny uses the girls' latest invention, the HumAnimal Converter, to be a dog. / Johnny wants to make his mark on the world by becoming a folk hero.
episodes.title: Here Johnny, Here Boy / Johnny Applesauce

episodes.synopsis: Johnny and Dukey wish they could battle mini-mons for real like in their video game! / Johnny won't take a bath, and he's really starting to smell.
episodes.title: Johnny'mon / Bathtime for Johnny

episodes.synopsis: Johnny, with his sisters' help, creates a new holiday - KidsGetFreeCandyDay! / Mr. Black & Mr. White need the girls' to build a telekinetic helmet.
episodes.title: Johnny Test: Monster Starter / Johnny Holiday

episodes.synopsis: The girls' newest device gives Johnny his own cool voiceover to narrate his life. / Johnny lies about his age to play a new online battle game.
episodes.title: Coming to a Johnny Near You / When Johnny Comes Marching Home

episodes.synopsis: Johnny tries to make himself sick to avoid a big test at school. / Johnny needs to look older so he can go see a scary blockbuster.
episodes.title: Johnnyitis / Johnny Moustache

episodes.synopsis: Bumper is on a bender at school and kids are getting their butts kicked. / Susan & Mary have a date with Gil, but can't find their favourite shoes!
episodes.title: Johnny Fu / Johnny Escapes from Bling-Bling Island

episodes.synopsis: Johnny decides to "borrow" the girls' monkey Lolo and rent her out for parties. / Johnny needs to get an "A", or risks going to summer school!
episodes.title: Johnny's Monkey Business / Johnny Bench

episodes.synopsis: The girls revisit their "extra arms" theory and, of course, test it on Johnny. / Johnny & Dukey wonder if there is life in space.
episodes.title: Johnny Long Legs / Johnny Test in Outer Space

episodes.synopsis: It's a race! First one to the Porkbelly Boat Launch is super champion of the world! / The girls test a perfume on Johnny that makes him irresistible.
episodes.title: Johnny Kart Racing / Johnny Smells Good

episodes.synopsis: Johnny & Dukey must return to Tiny'mon land to save Dad. / The town is convinced the old Porkbelly Inn is haunted by ghosts.
episodes.title: Return of Johnny'mon / Johnny Dukey Doo

episodes.synopsis: The Johnny Stopping Evil Force 5 return to destroy Johnny X! / The Earth is under attack by Dark Vegan and his entire Armada.
episodes.title: JX5: A New Beginning / JX5: The Final Ending

episodes.synopsis: Susan and Mary turn themselves into babies to get Gil's attention. / Johnny and Dukey transport into the middle of an art heist.
episodes.title: Johnny's New Baby Sisters / Porta Johnny

episodes.synopsis: Johnny joins the Lady Bird Scouts to sell cookies and win a bike. / Mary and Susan send Johnny back in time and he turns into Cave-Johnny.
episodes.title: Join the Johnny Scouts / Johnny B.C

episodes.synopsis: Dark Vegan is stranded on Earth and needs help returning home to Vegandon. / Susan and Mary create an AI droid as a homework assignment.
episodes.title: Dark Johnny / No Homework Johnny

episodes.synopsis: Johnny is fed up with his parents and runs away with Dukey. / The girls create a black hole, and Johnny steals a piece of it to play with.
episodes.title: Runaway Johnny / Johnny on the Spot

episodes.synopsis: Dad and Johnny switch brains for the day to see who has an easier life; Dukey is determined to prove he is as good as any pure bred dog.
episodes.title: Papa Johnny / The Johnnyminster Dog Show

episodes.synopsis: Johnny wants a to win a trophy for his trophy case. / The girls invent a mega muscle-metabolism-accelerator, which Dukey drinks by accident.
episodes.title: Johnny's Trophy Case / Dukey Jekyll and Johnny Hyde

episodes.synopsis: The girls create 100% accurate fortune cookies, which Johnny and Dukey plan to sell. / Johnny accidentally turns the girls dumb.
episodes.title: Johnny's Amazing Cookie Company / Johnny's Big Dumb Sisters

episodes.synopsis: Bling Bling hires Johnny to help him trick Susan into kissing him. / Susan and Mary turn Johnny into a mouse to help with an experiment for school.
episodes.title: My JohnnyGuard / Tom & Johnny

episodes.synopsis: Mr. Black and Mr. White need Johnny's help in stopping Larius Nefarious from taking over the world. / Whacko is released from prison.
episodes.title: The Quantum of Johnny / Johnny Get Yer Gum

episodes.synopsis: Johnny uses the girls Turbo Time Teahouse to send his class back in time. / Johnny and Dukey have fun testing Susan and Mary's 'Magnosizer'!
episodes.title: Old School Johnny / Johnny Degrees Below Zero

episodes.synopsis: Johnny and Dukey discover their evil twins terrorizing Porkbelly. / The girls need Johnny to test some experiments and cash in their Johnny Coupons.
episodes.title: Johnny Johnny / Double Johnny Coupons

episodes.synopsis: Dad buys Johnny a cheap phone and the girls upgrade it to techno-savvy CAL. / Johnny goes on a class trip to the Natural History Museum.
episodes.title: iJohnny / Johnny vs. The Mummy

episodes.synopsis: Johnny convinces his sisters to build him a pair of x-ray glasses. / Johnny and Dukey try to make Lolo into Super Monkey and it goes horribly wrong.
episodes.title: X-Ray Johnny / The Destruction of Johnny X

episodes.synopsis: The "Grow Your Own Monster" kit that Johnny ordered has finally arrived! / Mr. Teacherman pairs up Johnny and Sissy for a school project.
episodes.title: Johnny's Grow Your Own Monster / Who's Johnny

episodes.synopsis: Johnny has to perform 99 good deeds to make up for his 99 bad deeds. / Mr Black and Mr. White need Johnny to play a pretty princess.
episodes.title: 99 Deeds of Johnny Test / Princess Johnny

episodes.synopsis: Johnny and his friends race to make it out of Porkbelly National Park. / Mom brings the family to a weekend conference at a fancy ocean front hotel.
episodes.title: Johnny's Amazing Race / Johnny Test in 3D

episodes.synopsis: Mr. Black is devastated when Mr. White ends their friendship, and moves in with the Tests. / Mom and Dad try and find Johnny a best friend.
episodes.title: Guess Who's Coming to Johnny's for Dinner? / Johnny's BFF

episodes.synopsis: The girls fight over who would make a better girlfriend for Gil. / It's Valentine's Day and Susan bribes Johnny to protect her from Bling Bling!
episodes.title: Johnny's Big Sister Smackdown / Johnny vs. Bling Bling 4

episodes.synopsis: School's out for summer and Johnny is ready to catch some waves. / Brain Freeze is back in Porkbelly and wants revenge on Johnny Test.
episodes.title: Sunshine Malibu Johnny / Johnnycicle

episodes.synopsis: Dad decides it's time for Johnny to stop playing video games. / Sissy is determined to watch the Dawg and Bone marathon with Johnny.
episodes.title: King Johnny / Johnny Re-Animated

episodes.synopsis: It's Mom's birthday and Johnny is making her his special Johnny-cakes. / Johnny wants to become a web star on snoob-tube!
episodes.title: Johnny Cakes / Johnny Tube

episodes.synopsis: Johnny's got a wart and it plans on sticking around! / The girls convince Johnny to invite Gil over for a sleepover.
episodes.title: Johnny's Got a Wart! / Sleepover At Johnny's

episodes.synopsis: The girls turn Johnny into a goldfish to test their lastest experiment. / Johnny decides to take a much needed day off from school.
episodes.title: Johnny's Royal Flush / Johnny Test's Day Off

episodes.synopsis: Dad tries to discover what Johnny is amazing at so he can get a scholarship. / Dark Vegan tries to destroy Johnny Test again!
episodes.title: A Scholarship for Johnny / Johnny & Dark Vegan's Battle Brawl Mania

episodes.synopsis: Johnny has 4 hours to come up with a science fair project. / The Porkbelly Tech Crew team challenge Johnny to a race!
episodes.title: Johnny Lock Down / Johnny Boat Racing

episodes.synopsis: Johnny bets Sissy that he can write and direct a better school play than her. / Porkbelly is in trouble and Johnny X and friends need to save it!
episodes.title: Good Ol' Johnny Test / Johnny X Strikes Back Again

episodes.synopsis: Johnny is finally old enough to join in Porkbelly's Annual Running of the Squirrels, but he has to get past his mom, who thinks it's too dangerous.
episodes.title: Johnny Goes Nuts / Johnny Daddy Day

episodes.synopsis: Bling Bling schemes to win Susan's heart by rescuing her from a sinking ship. / Johnny and Dukey make every attempt to purchase a hot new video game.
episodes.title: Johnny Cruise / Rated J for Johnny

episodes.synopsis: Johnny discovers the advantages and disadvantages of being invisible. / The twins team up with Johnny against Bling Bling in their biggest clash yet.
episodes.title: Spotless Johnny / Johnny vs Bling Bling: The Ultimate Battle

episodes.synopsis: Johnny and Dukey ask the twins to make them 3-D glasses to wear every day. / Bling Bling uses a hypnotizing ring to make Susan fall in love with him.
episodes.title: Cat Scratch Johnny / Johnny of the Deep

episodes.synopsis: Johnny and Dukey travel back in time and land in the black-and-white 1950s. / Johnny asks the twins to make him more popular, but he soon regrets it.
episodes.title: Johnny Swellville / Johnny Irresistible

episodes.synopsis: Johnny hypnotizes Susan and Mary's lab mouse. / The agents ask Johnny to help them find their deadliest rogue agent -- a cuddly robotic puppy.
episodes.title: Black & White & Johnny All Over / Johnny's Rat Race

episodes.synopsis: Susan and Mary transform into vampires to get Gil's attention. / The girls give Johnny a growth injection that turns him into a hulking beast.
episodes.title: Fangs a Lot Johnny / Johnny Testosterone

episodes.synopsis: Johnny's chore turns into an all-out, souped-up lawnmower race. / Johnny borrows his sisters' building clones to build the hippest teen hangout.
episodes.title: Lawn Gone Johnny / Johnny's Ultimate Treehouse

episodes.synopsis: Johnny turns Dukey into a woodlands beast to frighten his dad out of a camping trip. / Everyone tries to win the Super Duper Pranking World Super Cup.
episodes.title: Johnny Goes Camping / Johnny's World Prank Wars 1

episodes.synopsis: Johnny tries to stop Dark Vegan's plans to destroy Sirloin, a planet made of meat. / A pair of pants takes over Johnny's brain, making him a genius.
episodes.title: How to Become a John-i Knight / The Return of Johnny Super Smarty Pants

episodes.synopsis: Johnny gets a key that opens any door and lock in the city. / Johnny must wear a ridiculous winter coat, but finds out it has tricks up its sleeves.
episodes.title: Johnny's Winter Jacket / Johnny's Keys to Success

episodes.synopsis: Johnny and the twins find out that sometimes the truth can hurt. / Susan switches bodies with Johnny so she can enter a boys-only science contest.
episodes.title: Johnny Two-Face / Johnny Susan Susan Johnny

episodes.synopsis: Johnny and Dukey enter another dimension where they meet a girl and her dog. / Johnny and his dad bet that Johnny can't show proper table manners.
episodes.title: My Dinner with Johnny / Johnny Alternative

episodes.synopsis: Johnny and Dukey spend the night in a haunted house. / Trying to win Gil's heart, the twins invent a machine that makes dreams come true.
episodes.title: Johnny Trick or Treat / Nightmare of Johnny's Street

episodes.synopsis: Johnny changes gender to enter an all-girls roller derby contest. / Johnny and Dukey get trapped in Whacko's "No Escape" video game.
episodes.title: Cool Hand Johnny / Roller Johnny

episodes.synopsis: Johnny must change from naughty to nice if he wants to get the Christmas present he wants. / Johnny hosts an epic snowball fight.
episodes.title: A Holly Johnny Christmas / Johnny's 1st Annual Snow Ball

episodes.synopsis: Johnny gets sent to a broken-down summer camp where Dukey isn't allowed. / Germs from Johnny's bathroom grow out of control and attack Porkbelly.
episodes.title: Lakeside Johnny / Johnny Germ Fighter

episodes.synopsis: Johnny is determined to get in to the "Stout Book of Crazy-Inane & Useless Records." / A bratty rich kid challenges Johnny to a dog sled race.
episodes.title: Johnny's World Record / Mush Johnny Mush

episodes.synopsis: Johnny, Dukey and the girls discover a treasure map in the attic. / Johnny is failing in school and has to earn extra credit to avoid summer school.
episodes.title: Johnny's Treasure / Extra Credit Johnny

episodes.synopsis: When Johnny breaks his foot, the girls give him a robotic replacement. / To get at Johnny, a villain first goes after Susan and Mary.
episodes.title: Johnny's Left Foot / Johnny vs the Tickler

episodes.synopsis: Johnny and Dukey accidentally free a special ladybug with a monstrous appetite. / Johnny, Dukey and Mary go on a deep ocean quest to save Susan.
episodes.title: Bugged Out Johnny / Johnny Test's Quest

episodes.synopsis: Johnny launches his own breakfast cereal with a real alien blaster found in each box. / Mary and Susan give Dukey a DNA upgrade, but it backfires.
episodes.title: Johnny O's / It's Du-kay, Johnny

episodes.synopsis: Johnny becomes an amazing magician, thanks to the girls' Magi-nator. / The girls create a Johnny doll that can control Johnny's actions.
episodes.title: Magic Johnny / Dolly Johnny

episodes.synopsis: The girls make Johnny look like Speed McCool so he can land a job as a stunt double. / Agents Black & White send a distress signal from outer space.
episodes.title: Johnny McCool / It's an Invasion, Johnny

episodes.synopsis: Johnny and Dukey journey back to medieval times. / One of the girls' inventions is sold, and the Test family becomes richer than Bling Bling.
episodes.title: It's All Relative Johnny / Johnny Rich

episodes.synopsis: Johnny's former pet lizard, Reptoslicer, heads back to Earth in search of metal to eat. / Johnny gets a ghostly lesson in caring for Mother Earth.
episodes.title: Johnny X...Again? / Johnny Green

episodes.synopsis: Johnny hopes that Susan and Mary's time-stopping watch will prolong summer vacation. / Superhero Johnny X and Boy Drone X face off.
episodes.title: Johnny on the Clock / Johnny X-Factor

episodes.synopsis: Dukey refuses to go to the veterinarian. / With help from a fan, Johnny squares off against Dark Vegan again.
episodes.title: Johnny Vets Dukey / Johnny's #1 Fan

episodes.synopsis: Susan and Mary accidentally erase all of Johnny's memories. / Susan and Mary's orangutan becomes a bank robber after Johnny lets him watch old movies.
episodes.title: How to Train Your Johnny / Johnny and Clyde

episodes.synopsis: The gang races video-game go-karts. / When Johnny borrows the girls' voice-replicating device, he turns Mary and Susan against each other.
episodes.title: Johnny's Super Massive Kart Wheelies 7 / Smooth Talkin' Johnny

episodes.synopsis: A giant cereal stalk takes Johnny, Dukey, Susan and Mary on a magical journey. / Johnny has to show the grounded Bling Bling how to be a regular kid.
episodes.title: Johnny and the Beanstalk / Bling Bling Bond Bond

episodes.synopsis: Using Susan and Mary's science, Johnny turns a puppet into a killer ventriloquist act for a talent contest. / Johnny and Bling Bling take up topiary.
episodes.title: Johnny's Got Talent / Johnny's Rough Around the Hedges

episodes.synopsis: Just before a big air show, the General puts Susan, Mary, Johnny and Dukey under house arrest. / Johnny is named the new hall monitor.
episodes.title: Johnny's Head in the Clouds / Stop in the Name of Johnny

episodes.synopsis: Things spin out of control when Johnny uses the girls' Attitude Alternator. / With the kids growing up and robots doing the chores, Dad feels useless.
episodes.title: Johnny Opposite / Johnny on the Job

episodes.synopsis: Johnny falls into a fairy-tale sleep from which he can't be roused. / Bling Bling uses fairy-tale spray to make Susan think he's her Prince Charming.
episodes.title: Johnny's 100th Episode / Johnny's Next Episode

episodes.synopsis: Johnny and Dukey borrow the girls' Theme-ometer, which turns real life into movies. / Johnny and Dukey travel back in time to the 1980s.
episodes.title: Johnny's Supreme Theme / Past & Present Johnny

episodes.synopsis: Sissy and Johnny battle to see who will be the better sand castle knight. / Johnny and Dukey find the mythical abominable snowman.
episodes.title: The Sands of Johnny / Abominable Johnny

episodes.synopsis: Johnny and Dukey compete in a Halloween contest to win the edible Big Rock Candy Mountain. / The girls' love potion backfires on Valentine's Day.
episodes.title: The Johnny Who Saved Halloween / Johnny Zombie Bomb

episodes.synopsis: Johnny and Dukey use the girls' remote-controlled i-Collar to get into a new dog spa. / Mr. Mittens turns Johnny and Dukey into petting-zoo animals.
episodes.title: Johnny vs. the Dukenator / Johnny's Petting Zoo

episodes.synopsis: A new villain shows up in Porkbelly and steals everyone's high-tech gear. / Johnny must prove he's responsible when his parents leave him home alone.
episodes.title: Johnny's New Super Mega Villain / Johnny in Charge

episodes.synopsis: Johnny uses his video-game savvy to save the Test family from doom. / Monsters from the girls' failed experiments hatch a plan to take over Porkbelly.
episodes.title: Johnny Unplugged / Johnny's Monster Mash

episodes.synopsis: Johnny borrows the girls' newest invention, which lets him talk to animals. / Chaos ensues when the Test clan poses for a family portrait at the mall.
episodes.title: Johnny's Chipmunk Chitchat / A Picture Worth a Thousand Johnnies

episodes.synopsis: Johnny and Dukey use the girls' time machine to prank call historical figures. / The Test family heads out on a road trip to Upchuck Geysers.
episodes.title: Dial J for Johnny / Road Trip Johnny

episodes.synopsis: Johnny and Dukey use the twins' supercomputer to win all the prizes in a contest. / The girls insert a computer chip into Johnny's brain.
episodes.title: Code Crackin' Johnny / Johnny Goes Viral

episodes.synopsis: A particle accelerator mishap makes Johnny and Bling Bling fall apart, literally. / Everyone in town wants to get hold of the girls' science project.
episodes.title: Franken Johnny / The Johnny Express

episodes.synopsis: When the girls create a crash-test robot, Johnny fights to get his job back as their test subject. / Dad donates Johnny's toys to charity.
episodes.title: Crash Test Johnny / Johnny's Junky Trunk

episodes.synopsis: The gang uses the girls' Super Chamber to acquire superhero powers. / Johnny must pull out all the stops to keep Gil from moving away.
episodes.title: Super Johnny Action Federation / Gil-Stopping Johnny

episodes.synopsis: When the kids plot to stop Dad's meatloaf making, they end up in a food fight. / Dark Vegan sabotages Porkbelly's Easter egg hunt.
episodes.title: Johnny with a Chance of Meatloaf / It's Easter, Johnny Test

episodes.synopsis: A future version of Johnny pays him a visit to pass on helpful hints. / Johnny goes blind after using one of the girls' inventions.
episodes.title: Future Johnny / Dukey See, Johnny Do

episodes.synopsis: While trying to create a hair growth formula, the girls accidently turn Johnny into a werewolf. / All the pizzas in Porkbelly suddenly vanish.
episodes.title: Hair's Johnny / Johnny's Hunger Games

episodes.synopsis: The girls shrink Johnny and Dukey to catch a troublemaking mouse. / Johnny and Dukey are transported inside their favorite video game.
episodes.title: Tiny Johnny / Johnny Goes Gaming

episodes.synopsis: The General grounds all superhero activity just as Porkbelly finds itself under attack. / Johnny and Dukey get sucked into a history book.
episodes.title: The Last Flight of Johnny X / Johnny's Last Chapter
